mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and layout elements for better scaling and legibility on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider reducing image sizes and using a content delivery network (CDN) for faster loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword usage and meta tags, especially for location-based searches and amenities.
userExperienceTip: Add clearer calls to action on the homepage and navigation to make key actions more accessible.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of fields and making navigation more intuitive.
tips: Improve mobile responsiveness by adapting images and text for smaller devices.
